```{r}
library(epicalc)
setwd("~/GitHub/Titanic_EDA/Titanic_EDA")
data <- read.csv("train.csv", header = T, stringsAsFactors = T)
data$Survived <- ifelse(data$Survived==0,"Dead/Unk","Survived")
tab1(data$Survived)
data$Pclass <- factor(data$Pclass)
use(data)
des()
x <- tableStack(vars=c(3,5,6,7,8,12), by = Survived)
x
write.csv(x,"univariate train.csv")
```
